title: 1234Text
description:
1234 Text is a project focused on secure, encrypted messaging. Sometimes, you may want to share an important text or message with someone, but there's a risk that others could access and read your sensitive information.
This is where 1234 Text comes inâ€”it protects your message by encrypting it before sharing.
Only the intended recipient can decrypt and read the content, ensuring your privacy and security.
It's a simple yet powerful solution for safe and confidential communication.

details.title: Technology
details.text: Laravel, PHP, MySql, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, CSS, HTML
